The Republic of Azerbaijan appreciates its relations with the Russian Federation and tries to expand and strengthen it.
Azerbaijan as a co-chair of the OSCE Minsk Group highly appreciates Russia's role in the settlement of the Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.
Azerbaijan is for the negotiation process. The settlement of the conflict is in line with Azerbaijan's interests.
Azerbaijan welcomes the initiative of the OSCE Minsk Group co-chairs. Challenges to change the status quo should also be heard in Armenia.
Changing the status quo, starting the occupation of Azerbaijani lands is a prerequisite for the settlement of the conflict.
By changing the status quo, peace, security and cooperation in the region will be established.

According to the newsletter, G7 Foreign Minister announced the Hiroshima Declaration that Hiroshima and Nagasaki stated that "they experienced extremely devastating destruction and inhuman hardships" in atomic bomb survivors.

However, "US Secretary of State Kelly talks with Foreign Minister Kishida to visit the Peace Memorial Park in Hiroshima City" to show the importance of world peace, the existence of a strong US-Japan alliance for the security of the world I said, "I said," I said "I said" I said "I was stunned and felt strong resentment.
On the contrary, saying that the existence of a strong Japan - US alliance shows the importance of world peace without having an apology to use the atomic bomb which is an inhumane weapon!

Such an arrogance clearly shows a decline in the leadership of the United States, and it promotes distrust of Asia from Japan to follow it. It is opposite to the thought that I visited the Nanjing Massacre Memorial Hall and the Seodaemun prison in South Korea.
